channel.title: Help please

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I’ve searched for ages on the internet, but I can’t figured it out.

I want to make a text that if I click on, it will make an object on the ground

i’m thinking about using this code :

case <actionbutton id>: c.addSkillXP(100, 1); c.makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, objectID, int type); break;
but it gives error in clickbutton.cfg

Read full topic
